articles.author: ZeeBiz WebDesk
articles.title: KRBLs Rs 325 crore share buyback at 27% premium to open from August 31, check key details here - Zee Business
articles.description: The share buyback will only be available for investors who held KRBL shares as of the record date, August 25. The buyback will be settled by September 13. The registrar of the buyback is Alankit Assignments Limited.
articles.content: Rice exporter KRBL Limited has informed bourses that the company will be opening a Rs 325 crore share buyback from August 31. The company will buyback equity shares of face value Rs 1 each at Rs 500 … [+1680 chars]
